mmfsl_fd_terms_conditions.authorizeManufacturerDeclaration: I hereby authorize Mahindra and Mahindra Financial Service Ltd. to process my 'Fixed Deposit' application without my physical signatures on FD form.
mmfsl_fd_terms_conditions.acceptKYCDeclaration: I hereby accept the KYC details and documents provided with CERSAI as the accepted data and documentary proof for the purpose of my Fixed Deposit investment. I also understand that, in case there is any difference in the information while making the investment, in comparison to CERSAI data, the data available from CERSAI will be final.
mmfsl_fd_terms_conditions.acceptFetchKYCConsentDeclaration: I/We hereby expressly consent to MMFSL to search, download, upload/share with Central KYC registry & receive information through SMS/e-mail on the above registered mobile number/e-mail id for the purpose of KYC compliance.
mmfsl_fd_terms_conditions.thirdPartyTransfersDeclaration: The third party cheque/fund transfers are not allowed. Funds received from 3rd party, on identification, shall be transferred back to the same account without interest & no FDR will be created for such applications. Fund transfer done on a particular calendar date(0.00 hrs till 23.59hrs) Fixed Deposit Receipt(FDR) date & Fixed Deposit interest will commence from the next working day OR on realisation of the amount by the Company.

description: Can be liquidated in the open market.
Loan can be availed upto 80% of the gold value.
Option to liquidate fixed deposits prematurely with minimal penal charges.
Loan can be availed upto 80% of the fixed deposit value.

fd_vs_gold_comparison.title: Regular Income
fd_vs_gold_comparison.goldDescription: Not designed for regular income generation, Gold is an asset that helps in wealth creation over time and a hedge against inflation.
fd_vs_gold_comparison.fdDescription: Option to opt for periodic payouts. One can opt for monthly returns as well.

fd_vs_gold_comparison.title: Holding Period & Flexibility
fd_vs_gold_comparison.goldDescription: Gold investment can be done in various forms like gold bullion, ETF, SGB with various tenures.
fd_vs_gold_comparison.fdDescription: FD comes with flexible tenures from 7 days to 10 years.

fd_vs_gold_comparison.title: Taxation
fd_vs_gold_comparison.goldDescription: Returns from gold are categorized as 'Capital gains', one can avail the indexation benefit as well.
fd_vs_gold_comparison.fdDescription: Interest income from fixed deposit is taxed as per income tax slab.
